desc: This update to a Wrox bestseller dives in and guides the reader through the entire process of creating dynamic, data-driven sites using the open source “AMP” model: Apache Web server, the MySQL database system, and the PHP scripting language. The team of expert authors covers PHP scripting, database management, security, integration, and e-commerce functions and comes complete with a useful syntax reference.

details.authors: Jason Gerner, Yann Le Scouarnec, Michael K. Glass

title: Beginning PHP5, Apache, and MySQL Web Development
